name: Snobs like it clean !
description:
We squires work Day by Day for these snobs and how do they thank us?

They scream at us!

So Gather, my Comrades!  And kill as many snobs as you can!

My Snob likes it clean and tidy but all this intestines pile up with all this fighting and My Snob will go crazy if there are too many. But the battlefield is the best method to get rid of him.

So I will tidy up and Burn them so i can kill as many Generations of this snobby familie as possible.

What a coincidence the devil is right here!

R : Restart the game (blocked)

J : to pickup body parts, cremate them or pickup body parts from the cupboard

K : to buy new furnaces or upgrades from the devi

L : to put the body parts in the cupboard

W, A, S, D : to move

Green : clean and tidy
Yellow : could be better
Orange : too much
Red : I'm leaving now

      +       =    

Its Heaven coins for cremate of body parts!



The devil
- upgrade monster
- upgrade your bag
- cleans up for you



The snob (your Enemy)


The servant (the Player)


The Monster (our friends)

Post-jam Update !

- rearrange controls

- ingame tutorial

- instead of any key you have to press a button

- for now restart is blocked

- monster update got an downgrade


just to make sure!

Credits : for Music

"Master of the Feast" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
